19024047Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Property, Inherited = false, AllowMultiple = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic class IndexAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IndexAttribute(string name, bool unique = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Name = name;Di2015NewLine        this.IsUnique = unique;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Name { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsUnique { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19024047Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.Entity;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class IndexInitializer<T> : IDatabaseInitializer<T> where T : DbContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string CreateIndexQueryTemplate = "CREATE {unique} INDEX {indexName} ON {tableName} ({columnName})";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void InitializeDatabase(T context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const BindingFlags PublicInstance = BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var dataSetProperty in typeof(T).GetProperties(PublicInstance).Where(Di2015NewLine            p => p.PropertyType.Name == typeof(DbSet<>).Name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var entityType = dataSetProperty.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments().Single();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TableAttribute[] tableAttributes = (TableAttribute[])entityType.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(TableAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var property in entityType.GetProperties(PublicInstance))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IndexAttribute[] indexAttributes = (IndexAttribute[])property.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(IndexAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine                NotMappedAttribute[] notMappedAttributes = (NotMappedAttribute[])property.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(NotMappedAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine                if (indexAttributes.Length > 0 && notMappedAttributes.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ColumnAttribute[] columnAttributes = (ColumnAttribute[])property.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(ColumnAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (var indexAttribute in indexAttributes)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string indexName = indexAttribute.Name;Di2015NewLine                        string tableName = tableAttributes.Length != 0 ? tableAttributes[0].Name : dataSetProperty.Name;Di2015NewLine                        string columnName = columnAttributes.Length != 0 ? columnAttributes[0].Name : property.Name;Di2015NewLine                        string query = CreateIndexQueryTemplate.Replace("{indexName}", indexName)Di2015NewLine                            .Replace("{tableName}", tableName)Di2015NewLine                            .Replace("{columnName}", columnName)Di2015NewLine                            .Replace("{unique}", indexAttribute.IsUnique ? "UNIQUE" : string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        context.Database.CreateIfNotExists();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        context.Database.ExecuteSqlCommand(query);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19028167Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int ToInt32(double value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value >= 0.0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value < 2147483647.5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int num = (int)value;Di2015NewLine            double num2 = value - (double)num;Di2015NewLine            if (num2 > 0.5 || (num2 == 0.5 && (num & 1) != 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                num++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return num;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value >= -2147483648.5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int num3 = (int)value;Di2015NewLine            double num4 = value - (double)num3;Di2015NewLine            if (num4 < -0.5 || (num4 == -0.5 && (num3 & 1) != 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                num3--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return num3;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new OverflowException(Environment.GetResourceString("Overflow_Int32"));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19031473Di2015UniqueSeparator(?=                         # Opening positive lookaheadDi2015NewLine    ([A-Z]                  # Opening capture group and any uppercase letter (to match R & D)Di2015NewLine        (?:                 # First non-capture group openingDi2015NewLine            (?:             # Second non-capture group openingDi2015NewLine                (?'O'{)     # Get the named opening braceDi2015NewLine                [^{}]*      # Any non-braceDi2015NewLine            )+              # Close of second non-capture group and repeat over as many times as necessaryDi2015NewLine            (?:             # Third non-capture group openingDi2015NewLine                (?'-O'})    # Removal of named opening brace when encounteredDi2015NewLine                [^{}]*?     # Any other non-brace characters in case there are more nested bracesDi2015NewLine            )+              # Close of third non-capture group and repeat over as many times as necessaryDi2015NewLine        )+                  # Close of first non-capture group and repeat as many times as necessary for multiple side by side nested bracesDi2015NewLine        (?(O)(?!))          # Condition to prevent unbalanced bracesDi2015NewLine    )                       # Close capture groupDi2015NewLine)                           # Close positive lookaheadDi2015NewLine
19031473Di2015UniqueSeparator(?=([A-Z]{(?:[^{}]|(?1))+}))Di2015NewLine
19031473Di2015UniqueSeparator(?=                    # Opening positive lookaheadDi2015NewLine    ([A-Z]             # Opening capture group and any uppercase letter (to match R & D)Di2015NewLine        {              # Opening braceDi2015NewLine            (?:        # Opening non-capture groupDi2015NewLine                [^{}]  # Matches non bracesDi2015NewLine            |          # ORDi2015NewLine                (?1)   # Recurse first capture groupDi2015NewLine            )+         # Close non-capture group and repeat as many times as necessaryDi2015NewLine        }              # Closing braceDi2015NewLine    )                  # Close of capture groupDi2015NewLine)                      # Close of positive lookaheadDi2015NewLine

19033699Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DynamicTypeDescriptor dt = new DynamicTypeDescriptor(typeof(MyBeautifulClass));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // initialize the class the way you wantDi2015NewLine    MyBeautifulClass c = new MyBeautifulClass();Di2015NewLine    c.MyProperty = "hello world";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // we need to replace a property by another version, so let's remove the existing oneDi2015NewLine    dt.RemoveProperty("MyProperty");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create a new similar property with a new editor and the current valueDi2015NewLine    dt.AddProperty(Di2015NewLine        typeof(string),            // typeDi2015NewLine        "MyProperty",              // nameDi2015NewLine        c.MyProperty,              // valueDi2015NewLine        "My Property",             // display name Di2015NewLine        "My Property Description", // descriptionDi2015NewLine        "My Category",             // categoryDi2015NewLine        false,                     // has default value?Di2015NewLine        null,                      // default valueDi2015NewLine        false,                     // readonly?Di2015NewLine        typeof(MyEditor));         // editor Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create a wrapped object from the original one.Di2015NewLine    // unchanged properties will keep their current valueDi2015NewLine    var newObject = dt.FromComponent(c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // hook on value changeDi2015NewLine    newObject.PropertyChanged += (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // update the original objectDi2015NewLine        // note: the code could be made more genericDi2015NewLine        c.MyProperty = newObject.GetPropertyValue<string>(e.PropertyName, null);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    propertyGrid1.SelectedObject = newObject;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyBeautifulClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string MyProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this stupid sample editor puts a current string in upper case... :-)Di2015NewLinepublic class MyEditor : UITypeEditorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(ITypeDescriptorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object EditValue(ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value == null ? value : value.ToString().ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19034132Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Counter<T> : IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<T, int>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<T, int>> sequence;Di2015NewLine    public Counter(IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<T, int>> sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.sequence = sequence;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Counter<T> operator -(Counter<T> first, Counter<T> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Counter<T>(first.Join(secondDi2015NewLine            , pair => pair.Key, pair => pair.Key, (a, b) =>Di2015NewLine                new KeyValuePair<T, int>(a.Key, a.Value - b.Value))Di2015NewLine            .Where(pair => pair.Value > 0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<KeyValuePair<T, int>> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19034968Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void btnFindPopulation_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StreamReader inputFile = File.OpenText("USPopulation.txt");                     //Open the USPopulation.txt file.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<int> PopulationList = new List<int>();                                     //Creates a list and a new object of the list.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int startingyear = 1950;                                                        //Creates the starting year for the index.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (!inputFile.EndOfStream)                                                  //While not at the end of the list.Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PopulationList.Add(int.Parse(inputFile.ReadLine()));                        //Read the scores into the list.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        inputFile.Close();                                                              //Close the file.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       int numberOfYears = PopulationList.Count();                                      //Counts the amount of items in the population and assigns it to number of years.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       int average = Average(PopulationList, numberOfYears);                            //Sends the population list and numberofyears into average.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       lblAnnualChange.Text = average.ToString();                                       //Assigns the new average into the lblAnnualChange.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       int biggest = startingyear + GreatestIncrease(PopulationList);                   //Adds the starting year with the index count of the biggest number.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       lblGreatestIncrease.Text = biggest.ToString();                                   //Assigns the biggest into the lblGreatestIncrease.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       int least = startingyear + LeastIncrease(PopulationList);                        //Sends the population list and number of years to least number.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       lblLeastIncrease.Text = least.ToString();                                        //Assigns the least into the lblLeastIncrease.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
19034968Di2015UniqueSeparator    private int GreatestIncrease(List<int> PopulationList)                              //Imports the population list to Greatest.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int amountOfChange = 0;Di2015NewLine        int changeInYears = 0;Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLine        int theChange = 0;Di2015NewLine        int currentYear = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (i = 1; i < PopulationList.Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            theChange = PopulationList[i] - PopulationList[i - 1];Di2015NewLine            currentYear = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (theChange > amountOfChange)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                amountOfChange = theChange;Di2015NewLine                changeInYears = i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return changeInYears;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int LeastIncrease(List<int> PopulationList)                                 //Imports the population list to Least.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int firstItem = PopulationList.First();Di2015NewLine        int lastItem = PopulationList.Last();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int amountOfChange = (lastItem - firstItem);Di2015NewLine        int changeInYears = 0;Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLine        int theChange = 0;Di2015NewLine        int CurrentYear = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (i = 1; i < PopulationList.Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            theChange = PopulationList[i] - PopulationList[i - 1];Di2015NewLine            CurrentYear = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (theChange < amountOfChange)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                amountOfChange = theChange;Di2015NewLine                changeInYears = i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return changeInYears;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19038664Di2015UniqueSeparatorAuthorizationContext
19038664Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool ActionIsAccessibleToUser(string actionName, ControllerBase controllerBase)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get controller context.Di2015NewLine    var controllerContext = new ControllerContext(this.ControllerContext.RequestContext, controllerBase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get controller descriptor.Di2015NewLine    var controllerDescriptor = new ReflectedControllerDescriptor(controllerBase.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get action descriptor.Di2015NewLine    var actionDescriptor = controllerDescriptor.FindAction(controllerContext, actionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check on authorization.Di2015NewLine    return ActionIsAuthorized(actionDescriptor, controllerContext);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool ActionIsAuthorized(ActionDescriptor actionDescriptor, ControllerContext controllerContext)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (actionDescriptor == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Action does not exist.Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get authorization context fo controller.Di2015NewLine    AuthorizationContext authContext = new AuthorizationContext(controllerContext, actionDescriptor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // run each auth filter until on failsDi2015NewLine    // performance could be improved by some cachingDi2015NewLine    var filters = FilterProviders.Providers.GetFilters(controllerContext, actionDescriptor);Di2015NewLine    FilterInfo filterInfo = new FilterInfo(filters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (IAuthorizationFilter authFilter in filterInfo.AuthorizationFilters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Attempt authorization.Di2015NewLine        authFilter.OnAuthorization(authContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If result is non-null, user is not authorized.Di2015NewLine        if (authContext.Result != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assume user is authorized.Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19040003Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionChainer
19040003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExpressionChainerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<TOuter, TInner>> Chain<TOuter, TMiddle, TInner>(Di2015NewLine        this Expression<Func<TOuter, TMiddle>> left, Expression<Func<TMiddle, TInner>> right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ChainTwo(left, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<TOuter, TInner>> ChainTwo<TOuter, TMiddle, TInner>(Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TOuter, TMiddle>> left, Expression<Func<TMiddle, TInner>> right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var swap = new SwapVisitor(right.Parameters[0], left.Body);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TOuter, TInner>>(Di2015NewLine               swap.Visit(right.Body), left.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class SwapVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine        public SwapVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.from = from;Di2015NewLine            this.to = to;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19040025Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Replace(string originalFile, string replacementsFile)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var originalContent = System.IO.File.ReadAllLines(originalFile);Di2015NewLine    var replacements = System.IO.File.ReadAllLines(replacementsFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var replacement in replacements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var _split = replacement.Split(new char[] { '^' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lineNumber = Int32.Parse(_split[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // checks if the original content file has that line number and replacesDi2015NewLine        if (originalContent.Length < lineNumber)Di2015NewLine            originalContent[lineNumber] = originalContent[lineNumber].Replace(_split[1], _split[2]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.IO.File.WriteAllLines(originalFile, originalContent);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19049340Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string CreateNewEntry(string current)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var indexIn = current.LastIndexOf("in"); // Get the last index of the word "in"Di2015NewLine    var indexOut = current.LastIndexOf("out"); // Get the last index of the word outDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (indexOut > indexIn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return current + " in "; // if the last "out" comes after the last "in"Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the last "in" comes after the last "out"Di2015NewLine        return current + " out "; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

watermark should be 10% of the image heightDi2015NewLine            int watermarkHeight = (int)(processImage.Height * 0.1);Di2015NewLine            int watermarkPadding = (int)(watermarkHeight * 0.1); // not completely true, but asume watermark is squareDi2015NewLine            // calculate rectangle. if there is extra text, add extra padding belowDi2015NewLine            Rectangle watermarkArea = new Rectangle(watermarkPadding, processImage.Height - (watermarkPadding + (watermarkText.Text.Length == 0 ? 0 : watermarkPadding) + watermarkHeight), watermarkHeight, watermarkHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // determine color watermarkDi2015NewLine            bmWatermark = black;Di2015NewLine            if (watermarkCombo.SelectedIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /*using (Bitmap watermarkClone = processImage.Clone(watermarkArea, processImage.PixelFormat))Di2015NewLine                {*/Di2015NewLine                var pixels = Pixels(processImage);Di2015NewLine                if (pixels.Average((Func<Color, decimal>)Intensity) < 110) // human eye adoption; normal threshold should be 128Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bmWatermark = white;Di2015NewLine                    drawBrush = new System.Drawing.SolidBrush(System.Drawing.Color.White);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //}Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (watermarkCombo.SelectedIndex == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bmWatermark = white;Di2015NewLine                drawBrush = new System.Drawing.SolidBrush(System.Drawing.Color.White);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // draw the watermarkDi2015NewLine            gWatermark.DrawImage(bmWatermark, watermarkArea.X, watermarkArea.Y, watermarkArea.Width, watermarkArea.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // draw the text (if needed)Di2015NewLine            if (watermarkText.Text.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Drawing.Font drawFont = new System.Drawing.Font("Tahoma", (float)watermarkPadding);Di2015NewLine                gWatermark.DrawString(watermarkText.Text, drawFont, drawBrush, watermarkPadding, processImage.Height - (watermarkPadding * 2));Di2015NewLine                drawFont.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // disposing resourcesDi2015NewLine            drawBrush.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // save the watermarked fileDi2015NewLine        processImage.Save(System.IO.Path.Combine(diWatermarked.FullName, fileName), System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // stop button pressed?Di2015NewLine        Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLine        if (stopProcess) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // update exection progressDi2015NewLine        progressBar1.Value++;Di2015NewLine        percentLabel.Text = ((int)((progressBar1.Value * 100) / filesToProcess.Count)).ToString() + "%";Di2015NewLine        fileCountLabel.Text = "File " + progressBar1.Value.ToString() + "/" + filesToProcess.Count.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (System.IO.StreamWriter sw = new System.IO.StreamWriter(System.IO.Path.Combine(folderText.Text, "errorlog.txt"), true))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sw.WriteLine("File: " + fileName);Di2015NewLine                while (ex != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sw.WriteLine("Message: " + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                    sw.WriteLine(ex.StackTrace);Di2015NewLine                    sw.WriteLine(ex.Source);Di2015NewLine                    ex = ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                sw.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // nothing to do - it already failedDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        errors++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (processImage != null) processImage.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// dispose resourcesDi2015NewLinewhite.Dispose();Di2015NewLineblack.Dispose();Di2015NewLinebmWatermark.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (!stopProcess)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // set status to completeDi2015NewLine    fileCountLabel.Text = "File " + filesToProcess.Count.ToString() + "/" + filesToProcess.Count.ToString();Di2015NewLine    percentLabel.Text = "100%";Di2015NewLine    fileNameLabel.Text = "Completed...";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    fileNameLabel.Text = "Aborted...";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefileNameLabel.Text += errors.ToString() + " error(s) encountered";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// defaults to screenDi2015NewLineprogressBar1.Value = progressBar1.Maximum;Di2015NewLinestopProcess = false;Di2015NewLinegoButton.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLinestopButton.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine

19050779Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SemaphoreConcurrencyHelper: IConcurrencyHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Semaphore _semaphore;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AcquireLock(string LockId, int Instances)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _semaphore = Semaphore.OpenExisting(GenerateMutexId(LockId)); //Acquire existing Semaphore (if exists)                   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException) // Create new Semaphore if not existsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _semaphore = new Semaphore(Instances, Instances, GenerateMutexId(LockId));                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _semaphore.WaitOne(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10), false); // Block thread until Semaphore has slot available within specified TimespanDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ReleaseLock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _semaphore.Release(1); // Increment the count on the Sempahore by 1Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false; //TODO: Add an error logDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _semaphore = null;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GenerateMutexId(string LockId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get application GUID as defined in AssemblyInfo.csDi2015NewLine        string appGuid = ((GuidAttribute)Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetCustomAttributes(typeof(GuidAttribute), false).GetValue(0)).Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine        appGuid = appGuid + LockId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unique id for global mutex - Global prefix means it is available system wideDi2015NewLine        return string.Format("Global\\\\{{{0}}}", appGuid);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19051097Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing NUnit.Framework;Di2015NewLineusing SharpTestsEx;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace StackOverflowExample.MoqDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public interface ISourceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        event Action<ISource> DataChanged;Di2015NewLine        int InvokationCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ClassToTestDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void DoWork(ISource source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            source.DataChanged += this.EventHanler;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void EventHanler(ISource source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            source.InvokationCount++;Di2015NewLine            source.DataChanged -= this.EventHanler;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [TestFixture]Di2015NewLine    public class EventUnsubscribeTestsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private class TestEventSource :ISourceDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public event Action<ISource> DataChanged;Di2015NewLine            public int InvokationCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void InvokeEvent()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (DataChanged != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DataChanged(this);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public bool IsEventDetached()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return DataChanged == null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [Test]Di2015NewLine        public void DoWork_should_detach_from_event_after_first_invocation()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //arrangeDi2015NewLine            var testSource = new TestEventSource();Di2015NewLine            var sut = new ClassToTest();Di2015NewLine            sut.DoWork(testSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //actDi2015NewLine            testSource.InvokeEvent();Di2015NewLine            testSource.InvokeEvent(); }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  void OnDataSourceCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs[] changes)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    List<NSIndexPath> indexPaths = new List<NSIndexPath>();Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(;index<changes.Length;index++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var e = changes[index];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      switch(e.Action)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine          indexPaths.AddRange(IndexPathHelper.FromRange(e.NewStartingIndex, e.NewItems.Count));Di2015NewLine          ICVS.ItemCount++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // attempt to batch subsequent changes of the same typeDi2015NewLine          if(index < changes.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            for(int i=index + 1; i<changes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              if(changes[i].Action == e.Action)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                indexPaths.AddRange(IndexPathHelper.FromRange(changes[i].NewStartingIndex, changes[i].NewItems.Count));Di2015NewLine                index++;Di2015NewLine                ICVS.ItemCount++;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          InsertItems(indexPaths.ToArray());Di2015NewLine          indexPaths.Clear();Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine          indexPaths.AddRange(IndexPathHelper.FromRange(e.OldStartingIndex, e.OldItems.Count));Di2015NewLine          ICVS.ItemCount--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // attempt to batch subsequent changes of the same typeDi2015NewLine          if(index < changes.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            for(int i=index + 1; i<changes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              if(changes[i].Action == e.Action)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                indexPaths.AddRange(IndexPathHelper.FromRange(changes[i].OldStartingIndex, changes[i].OldItems.Count));Di2015NewLine                index++;Di2015NewLine                ICVS.ItemCount--;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          DeleteItems(indexPaths.ToArray());Di2015NewLine          indexPaths.Clear();Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move:Di2015NewLine          PerformBatchUpdates(() =>Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            for(int i=0; i<e.OldItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine              MoveItem(NSIndexPath.FromItemSection(e.OldStartingIndex + i, 0), NSIndexPath.FromItemSection(e.NewStartingIndex + i, 0));Di2015NewLine          }, null);Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine          ICVS.ItemCount = ICVS.ActualItemCount;Di2015NewLine          ReloadData();Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19055191Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : Form {Di2015NewLine  [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine  static extern void keybd_event(byte bVk, byte bScan, int dwFlags, int dwExtraInfo);Di2015NewLine  public Form1(){Di2015NewLine     InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine     //Register event handlers for all the toolstripitems initiallyDi2015NewLine     foreach (ToolStripItem item in toolStrip1.Items){Di2015NewLine        item.MouseEnter += itemsMouseEnter;Di2015NewLine        item.MouseLeave += itemsMouseLeave;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     //We have to do this if we add/remove some toolstripitem at runtimeDi2015NewLine     //Otherwise we don't need the following codeDi2015NewLine     toolStrip1.ItemAdded += (s,e) => {Di2015NewLine        item.MouseEnter += itemsMouseEnter;Di2015NewLine        item.MouseLeave += itemsMouseLeave;Di2015NewLine     };Di2015NewLine     toolStrip1.ItemRemoved += (s,e) => {Di2015NewLine        item.MouseEnter -= itemsMouseEnter;Di2015NewLine        item.MouseLeave -= itemsMouseLeave;Di2015NewLine     };Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  bool pressedAlt;Di2015NewLine  private void itemsMouseEnter(object sender, EventArgs e){Di2015NewLine        if (!pressedAlt) {Di2015NewLine            //Hold the Alt keyDi2015NewLine            keybd_event(0x12, 0, 0, 0);//VK_ALT = 0x12Di2015NewLine            pressedAlt = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  private void itemsMouseLeave(object sender, EventArgs e){Di2015NewLine        if (pressedAlt){Di2015NewLine            //Release the Alt keyDi2015NewLine            keybd_event(0x12, 0, 2, 0);//flags = 2  -> Release the keyDi2015NewLine            pressedAlt = false;Di2015NewLine            SendKeys.Send("ESC");//Do this to make the GUI active againDi2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19055883Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void MergeDictionaries()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var oldData = new Dictionary<string, Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, int>>>>();Di2015NewLine    var todayData = new Dictionary<string, Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, int>>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var kvp in oldData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, int>>> today;Di2015NewLine        if (!todayData.TryGetValue(kvp.Key, out today))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            today = new Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, int>>>();Di2015NewLine            todayData.Add(kvp.Key, today);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var kvp2 in kvp.Value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, int>> today2;Di2015NewLine            if (!today.TryGetValue(kvp2.Key, out today2))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                today2 = new Dictionary<int, Dictionary<int, int>>();Di2015NewLine                today.Add(kvp2.Key, today2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var kvp3 in kvp2.Value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Dictionary<int, int> today3;Di2015NewLine                if (!today2.TryGetValue(kvp3.Key, out today3))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    today3 = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine                    today2.Add(kvp3.Key, today3);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (KeyValuePair<int, int> kvp4 in kvp3.Value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // What you do here determines what happens when there are key duplicatesDi2015NewLine                    today3[kvp4.Key] = kvp4.Value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19058649Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Func<string, string> CreateFunction(string typeAndMethod)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: *Lots* of validationDi2015NewLine    int lastDot = typeAndMethod.LastIndexOf('.');Di2015NewLine    string typeName = typeAndMethod.Substring(0, lastDot);Di2015NewLine    string methodName = typeAndMethod.Substring(lastDot + 1);Di2015NewLine    Type type = Type.GetType(typeName);Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo method = type.GetMethod(methodName, new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLine    return (Func<string, string>) Delegate.CreateDelegate(Di2015NewLine        typeof(Func<string, string>), method);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19062606Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Debounce {Di2015NewLine    private Action _action;Di2015NewLine    private bool _isThreadRunning;Di2015NewLine    private Thread _thread;Di2015NewLine    private DateTime _runAt;Di2015NewLine    private double _waitSeconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Debounce(double waitSeconds, Action action) {Di2015NewLine        _action = action;Di2015NewLine        _waitSeconds = waitSeconds;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Invoke() {Di2015NewLine        _runAt = DateTime.Now.AddSeconds(_waitSeconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock(this) {Di2015NewLine            if(!_isThreadRunning) {Di2015NewLine                _isThreadRunning = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _thread = new Thread(() => {Di2015NewLine                    while(true) {Di2015NewLine                        Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        lock(this) {Di2015NewLine                            if(DateTime.Now > _runAt) {Di2015NewLine                                _action();Di2015NewLine                                _isThreadRunning = false;Di2015NewLine                                _thread = null;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _thread.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Action, Debounce> __debounces;Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Action, Debounce> _debounces {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            if(__debounces == null) {Di2015NewLine                __debounces = new Dictionary<Action, Debounce>();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return __debounces;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Run(double waitSeconds, Action action) {Di2015NewLine        Debounce debounce;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(!_debounces.TryGetValue(action, out debounce)) {Di2015NewLine            debounce = new Debounce(waitSeconds, action);Di2015NewLine            _debounces.Add(action, debounce);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        debounce._waitSeconds = waitSeconds;Di2015NewLine        debounce.Invoke();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19064152Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void GetAllDrives()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DriveInfo[] drives = DriveInfo.GetDrives();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var drive in drives)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode rootTreeNode = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine            rootTreeNode.Text = drive.Name;Di2015NewLine            rootTreeNode.Tag = drive.Name;Di2015NewLine            rootTreeNode.ImageIndex = GetIconOfFile_Folder(drive.Name);Di2015NewLine            rootTreeNode.SelectedImageIndex = rootTreeNode.ImageIndex;Di2015NewLine            rootTreeNode.Nodes.Add(" "); //Placeholder to enable expanding (+)Di2015NewLine            treeView1.Nodes.Add(rootTreeNode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19064152Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void treeView1_BeforeExpand(object sender, TreeViewCancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        e.Node.Nodes.Clear();Di2015NewLine        GetFilesAndFolder(e.Node, (string)e.Node.Tag);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetFilesAndFolder(TreeNode tn, string Path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] Directories = Directory.GetDirectories(Path);Di2015NewLine            string[] Files = Directory.GetFiles(Path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (string dir in Directories)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TreeNode dirTreeNode = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine                dirTreeNode.Tag = dir;Di2015NewLine                dirTreeNode.Text = new DirectoryInfo(dir).Name;Di2015NewLine                dirTreeNode.ImageIndex = GetIconOfFile_Folder(dir);Di2015NewLine                dirTreeNode.SelectedImageIndex = dirTreeNode.ImageIndex;Di2015NewLine                dirTreeNode.Nodes.Add(" ");Di2015NewLine                tn.Nodes.Add(dirTreeNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (string file in Files)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TreeNode fileTreeNode = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine                fileTreeNode.Tag = file;Di2015NewLine                fileTreeNode.Text = new FileInfo(file).Name;Di2015NewLine                fileTreeNode.ImageIndex = GetIconOfFile_Folder(file);Di2015NewLine                fileTreeNode.SelectedImageIndex = fileTreeNode.ImageIndex;Di2015NewLine                tn.Nodes.Add(fileTreeNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(ex.Message, ex.Source, MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Exclamation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19068937Di2015UniqueSeparator    class Program {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine            var xml = @"Di2015NewLine<Root>Di2015NewLine  <System>Di2015NewLine    <ID>1</ID>Di2015NewLine    <Name>one</Name>Di2015NewLine    <Monitor>Di2015NewLine      <ID>3</ID>Di2015NewLine      <Type>t3</Type>Di2015NewLine      <Alert>Di2015NewLine        <ID>5</ID>Di2015NewLine        <Status>a5</Status>Di2015NewLine      </Alert>Di2015NewLine      <Alert>Di2015NewLine        <ID>6</ID>Di2015NewLine        <Status>a6</Status>Di2015NewLine      </Alert>Di2015NewLine    </Monitor>Di2015NewLine  </System>Di2015NewLine  <System>Di2015NewLine    <ID>2</ID>Di2015NewLine    <Name>two</Name>Di2015NewLine    <Monitor>Di2015NewLine      <ID>4</ID>Di2015NewLine      <Type>t4</Type>Di2015NewLine      <Alert>Di2015NewLine        <ID>7</ID>Di2015NewLine        <Status>a7</Status>Di2015NewLine      </Alert>Di2015NewLine    </Monitor>Di2015NewLine  </System>Di2015NewLine</Root>Di2015NewLine";Di2015NewLine            XElement xmlDoc = XElement.Parse(xml);Di2015NewLine            // set q to an enumeration of XElementsDi2015NewLine            // where the elements xname is "System"Di2015NewLine            // the query actually executes the first time q is usedDi2015NewLine            var q = xmlDoc.Elements("System");Di2015NewLine            foreach (var ele in q) {Di2015NewLine                // Get the value of the Element with the xname of "ID"Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ele.Element("ID").Value); Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ele.Element("Name").Value);Di2015NewLine                // if ele.Elements("Monitor") returns nothingDi2015NewLine                // then the foreach will be skipped (null-execution)Di2015NewLine                foreach (var mon in ele.Elements("Monitor")) {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(mon.Element("ID").Value);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(mon.Element("Type").Value);Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var alert in mon.Elements("Alert")) {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine(alert.Element("ID").Value);Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine(alert.Element("Status").Value);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

19072572Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] split = BigString.Split(' ').ToLower();Di2015NewLinevar duplicates = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0;i<split.Length;i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int j=i;Di2015NewLine    string s = split[i] + " ";Di2015NewLine    while(i+j<split.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        j++;Di2015NewLine        s += split[j] + " ";Di2015NewLine        if (Regex.Matches(BigString.ToLower(), s).Count ==1) break;Di2015NewLine        duplicates[s] = Regex.Matches(BigString.ToLower(), s).Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19075226Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(Di2015NewLine  this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine  IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() }; Di2015NewLine  return sequences.Aggregate( Di2015NewLine    emptyProduct, Di2015NewLine    (accumulator, sequence) => Di2015NewLine      from accseq in accumulator Di2015NewLine      from item in sequence Di2015NewLine      select accseq.Concat(new[] {item})); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19076336Di2015UniqueSeparator// remove "this" if not on C# 3.0 / .NET 3.5Di2015NewLinepublic static DataTable ConvertToDatatable<T>(this IList<T> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptorCollection props =Di2015NewLine        TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0 ; i < props.Count ; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyDescriptor prop = props[i];Di2015NewLine        table.Columns.Add(prop.Name, prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    object[] values = new object[props.Count];Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            values[i] = props[i].GetValue(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return table;        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19076570Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bill = new Person { FirstName = "Bill", TeamName = "Management" };Di2015NewLine    var joe = new Person { FirstName = "Joe", Manager = bill, TeamName = "Management" };Di2015NewLine    var scott = new Person { FirstName = "Scott", Manager = bill, TeamName = "Marketing" };Di2015NewLine    var jim = new Person { FirstName = "Jim", Manager = bill, TeamName = "Technology" };Di2015NewLine    var mark = new Person { FirstName = "Mark", Manager = scott, TeamName = "Marketing" };Di2015NewLine    var bob = new Person { FirstName = "Bob", Manager = joe, TeamName = "Marketing" };Di2015NewLine    var ted = new Person { FirstName = "Ted", Manager = jim, TeamName = "IT Support" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var people = new[] { bill, joe, scott, jim, mark, bob, ted };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var teamParents = people.Select (p => new { Team = p.TeamName, ParentTeam = p.Manager == null ? null : p.Manager.TeamName });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // don't let a team be its own parentDi2015NewLine    teamParents = teamParents.Where (p => !p.Team.Equals(p.ParentTeam));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // make sure they're all uniqueDi2015NewLine    teamParents = teamParents.Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // put it in a dictionaryDi2015NewLine    var teamHierarchy = teamParents.ToDictionary (p => p.Team, q => q.ParentTeam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string root in teamHierarchy.Where (h => h.Value == null).Select (h => h.Key))Di2015NewLine    {    Di2015NewLine        PrintSubteams(teamHierarchy, 0, root);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void PrintSubteams(Dictionary<string, string> hierarchy, int level, string root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < level; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("    ");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string child in hierarchy.Where (h => h.Value == root).Select(h => h.Key))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PrintSubteams(hierarchy, level + 1, child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PersonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string FirstName;Di2015NewLine    public string LastName;Di2015NewLine    public string TeamName;Di2015NewLine    public Person Manager;Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Person> DirectReports;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19080992Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private int firstNum = 2;Di2015NewLine        private int secondNum = 4;Di2015NewLine        private int answer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Form2()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine            operatorListBox1.Items.Add("+");Di2015NewLine            operatorListBox1.Items.Add("-");Di2015NewLine            operatorListBox1.Items.Add("*");Di2015NewLine            operatorListBox1.Items.Add("/");Di2015NewLine            //this next line would go in your designer.cs file.  I put it here for completenessDi2015NewLine            this.operatorListBox1.SelectedIndexChanged += new System.EventHandler(this.operatorListBox1_SelectedIndexChanged);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void operatorListBox1_SelectedIndexChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            calculateAnswer(((ListBox)sender).SelectedItem.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void calculateAnswer(string sign)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (sign)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case "+":Di2015NewLine                    answer = firstNum + secondNum;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case "-":Di2015NewLine                    answer = firstNum - secondNum;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case "*":Di2015NewLine                    answer = firstNum * secondNum;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case "/":Di2015NewLine                    answer = firstNum / secondNum;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            textBox4.Text = firstNum + " " + sign + " " + secondNum + " = " + answer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19082918Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NumericTextBox : TextBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region FormatoDi2015NewLine    private string previousText = "";Di2015NewLine    private bool sender, DataObjectPastingEventArgs dataObjectPastingEventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var isText = dataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject.GetDataPresent(System.Windows.DataFormats.Text, true);Di2015NewLine        if (isText)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var text = dataObjectPastingEventArgs.SourceDataObject.GetData(DataFormats.Text) as string;Di2015NewLine            if (IsTextValid(text))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        dataObjectPastingEventArgs.CancelCommand();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool IsTextValid(string enteredText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //  If keyboard insert key is in toggled mode, and the actual insert point is Decimalseparator, we must avoid to overwrite itDi2015NewLine        if (SelectionStart == this.Text.IndexOf(DecimalSeparator)Di2015NewLine            & System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GetKeyStates(System.Windows.Input.Key.Insert) == System.Windows.Input.KeyStates.Toggled)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SelectionStart += 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!enteredText.All(c => Char.IsNumber(c) || c == DecimalSeparator.ToCharArray()[0] || c == '-'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //We only validation against unselected text since the selected text will be replaced by the entered textDi2015NewLine        var unselectedText = this.Text.Remove(SelectionStart, SelectionLength);Di2015NewLine        if ( enteredText == DecimalSeparator && unselectedText.Contains(DecimalSeparator))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //  Before return false, must move cursor beside Decimal separatorDi2015NewLine            SelectionStart = this.Text.IndexOf(DecimalSeparator) + 1;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (enteredText == "-" && unselectedText.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool ApplyFormat(TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!ApplyingFormat)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ApplyingFormat = true;Di2015NewLine            int SelectionStartActual = SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine            string FinallText = this.Text;Di2015NewLine            if (!FinallText.Contains(DecimalSeparator) & DecimalPlaces > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FinallText = String.Format("{0}{1}{2}", this.Text, DecimalSeparator, new string('0', DecimalPlaces));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            bool state = Decimal.TryParse(FinallText, NumberStyles.AllowCurrencySymbol | NumberStyles.AllowDecimalPoint | NumberStyles.AllowTrailingSign, _CI, out DecimalValue);Di2015NewLine            DecimalValue = Math.Round(DecimalValue, DecimalPlaces);Di2015NewLine            if (DecimalValue == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FinallText = "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (FinallText != DecimalValue.ToString(_CI))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    FinallText = DecimalValue.ToString(_CI);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (FinallText != this.Text)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Text = FinallText;Di2015NewLine                SelectionStart = SelectionStartActual;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previousText = this.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ApplyingFormat = false;Di2015NewLine            return state;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnTextChanged(TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = !ApplyFormat(e);Di2015NewLine        base.OnTextChanged(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void 19084390Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Command : ICommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Action Action { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string DisplayName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Execute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Action != null)Di2015NewLine            Action();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CanExecute(object parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IsEnabled;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool _isEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine    public bool IsEnabledDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _isEnabled; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _isEnabled = value;Di2015NewLine            if (CanExecuteChanged != null)Di2015NewLine                CanExecuteChanged(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler CanExecuteChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Command(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action = action;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Command<T>: ICommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Action<T> Action { get; 19087117Di2015UniqueSeparator Only one instance of the ScriptManager control can be added to the page. Di2015NewLine The page can include the control directly, or indirectly inside a nested Di2015NewLine component such as a user control, content page for a master page, or nestedDi2015NewLine master page. If a page already contains a ScriptManager control, but a nested Di2015NewLine or parent component needs additional features of the ScriptManager control,Di2015NewLine the component can include a ScriptManagerProxy control. For example, the Di2015NewLine ScriptManagerProxy control enables you to add scripts and services that Di2015NewLine are specific to nested componentsDi2015NewLine

19096199Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("start");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var innerCts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    Exception mainException = null;Di2015NewLine    var mainThread = new Thread(() => SafeMainThread(innerCts, ref mainException));Di2015NewLine    mainThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var innerTask = Task.Factory.StartNew(state => PrintTime(state),Di2015NewLine                                          innerCts,Di2015NewLine                                          innerCts.Token,Di2015NewLine                                          TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning,Di2015NewLine                                          TaskScheduler.Default);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var innerFault = innerTask.ContinueWith(t => { Console.WriteLine("Inner thread caused " + t.Exception.InnerException.GetType().Name + ". Main thread is being aborted..."); mainThread.Abort(); },Di2015NewLine                                            TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var innerCancelled = innerTask.ContinueWith(_ => Console.WriteLine("Inner thread cancelled."),Di2015NewLine                                                TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnCanceled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var innerSucceed = innerTask.ContinueWith(_ => Console.WriteLine("Inner thread completed."),Di2015NewLine                                              TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        innerTask.Wait();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (AggregateException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Ignore.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mainThread.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void SafeMainThread(CancellationTokenSource innerCts, ref Exception mainException)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MainThread();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Main thread completed.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (ThreadAbortException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Main thread aborted.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Main thread caused " + exception.GetType().Name + ". Inner task is being canceled...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        innerCts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        mainException = exception;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void MainThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("master thread i={0}", i + 1);Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("exception");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void PrintTime(object state)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var cts = (CancellationTokenSource)state;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cts.Token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("inner thread i={0}", i + 1);Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new Exception("exception");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19096373Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<int, TreeNode> ParentCache = new Dictionary<int, TreeNode>();Di2015NewLineprivate void CreateNode(int id, int parentID, int rank, string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TreeNodeCollection parentNode = root.Nodes;Di2015NewLine    if(parentID != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode foundParentNode;Di2015NewLine        if (!ParentCache.TryGetValue(parentID, out foundParentNode)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Given parentID has not been added to the tree yet - " + parentID.ToString());Di2015NewLine        parentNode = foundParentNode.ChildNodes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TreeNode newNode = new TreeNode(text, id.ToString());Di2015NewLine    parentNode.Add(newNode);Di2015NewLine    ParentCache.Add(id, newNode);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19100418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ContentTypeFilter : DelegatingHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<MediaTypeHeaderValue> _suport;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary />Di2015NewLine    public ContentTypeFilter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _suport = new List<MediaTypeHeaderValue>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var formatter in GlobalConfiguration.Configuration.Formatters.ToArray())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _suport.AddRange(formatter.SupportedMediaTypes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Task<HttpResponseMessage> SendAsync(HttpRequestMessage request, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var metodos = new List<string> { "POST", "PUT", "PATCH" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (request.Content != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (metodos.Contains(request.Method.Method.ToUpperInvariant()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MediaTypeHeaderValue contentType = request.Content.Headers.ContentType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Nas configurações não possui o Charset aceito.Di2015NewLine                if (contentType == null || !_suport.Any(x => x.MediaType.Equals(contentType.MediaType)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return Task<HttpResponseMessage>.Factory.StartNew(() => CreateResponse(request, "Suported content-types: " + string.Join(", ", _suport.Select(x => x.ToString()))));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.SendAsync(request, cancellationToken);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static HttpResponseMessage CreateResponse(HttpRequestMessage request, string mensagem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var response = request.CreateResponse(HttpStatusCode.UnsupportedMediaType);Di2015NewLine        response.ReasonPhrase = mensagem;Di2015NewLine        response.Content = new StringContent(mensagem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return response;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19101721Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void mySW()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string path = @"C:\\Other\\myFile.txt";Di2015NewLine    string userName = userNameBox.Text;Di2015NewLine    string password = passwordBox.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(path, true))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This overload makes your life easier by auto-formatting variables for you.Di2015NewLine        // Also, avoid the "string1 + string2" concatenation mode.Di2015NewLine        // Use String.Format instead. It's easier to read and keep over time.Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine("Username: {0} Password: {1}", userName, password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // No need to close nor dispose your StreamWriter.Di2015NewLine        // You're inside a using statement for that!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Thanks for registering! \\n\\nYou may now log in!", "Registration SuccessFul");Di2015NewLine    Application.OpenForms[0].Show();Di2015NewLine    this.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19101721Di2015UniqueSeparator{Di2015NewLine    // Loads your users storageDi2015NewLine    var users = File.ReadAllLines(@"C:\\Other\\myFile.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Creates the line with username + passwordDi2015NewLine    var usernamePassword = String.Format("Username: {0} Password: {1}", userNameBox.Text, passwordBox.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Locates the user on your storageDi2015NewLine    // This uses Linq syntax with lambda. Linq without lamba looks similar to SQL.Di2015NewLine    // Lambda is a bit more advanced but reduces code-size and it's easier to understand (IMHO).Di2015NewLine    // This code will iterate through users (list of string) and try to retrieve one that's equal to the contents of usernamePassword.Di2015NewLine    var userFound = users.SingleOrDefault(_u => _u.Equals(usernamePassword));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If null, indicates that no username/password combination was found.Di2015NewLine    if (userFound != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Welcome back, " + userNameBox.Text);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Sorry, you have entered incorrect details\\n\\nPlease try again");Di2015NewLine        userNameBox.Text = "";Di2015NewLine        passwordBox.Text = "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19105119Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static MvcHtmlString LabelHelper(HtmlHelper html, ModelMetadata metadata, string htmlFieldName, string labelText = null, IDictionary<string, object> htmlAttributes = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string str = labelText;Di2015NewLine  if (str == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string displayName = metadata.DisplayName;Di2015NewLine    if (displayName == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string propertyName = metadata.PropertyName;Di2015NewLine      if (propertyName == null)Di2015NewLine        str = Enumerable.Last<string>((IEnumerable<string>) htmlFieldName.Split(new char[1]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          '.'Di2015NewLine        }));Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine        str = propertyName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      str = displayName;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  string innerText = str;Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(innerText))Di2015NewLine    return MvcHtmlString.Empty;Di2015NewLine  TagBuilder tagBuilder1 = new TagBuilder("label");Di2015NewLine  tagBuilder1.Attributes.Add("for", TagBuilder.CreateSanitizedId(html.ViewContext.ViewData.TemplateInfo.GetFullHtmlFieldName(htmlFieldName)));Di2015NewLine  tagBuilder1.SetInnerText(innerText);Di2015NewLine  TagBuilder tagBuilder2 = tagBuilder1;Di2015NewLine  bool flag = true;Di2015NewLine  IDictionary<string, object> attributes = htmlAttributes;Di2015NewLine  int num = flag ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine  tagBuilder2.MergeAttributes<string, object>(attributes, num != 0);Di2015NewLine  return TagBuilderExtensions.ToMvcHtmlString(tagBuilder1, TagRenderMode.Normal);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19105802Di2015UniqueSeparatorHashSet<DateTime>
19105802Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class HolidayTesterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static HashSet<DateTime> fixedHolidays = new HashSet<DateTime>(new DayOnlyComparer())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new DateTime(1900,1,1), //New YearsDi2015NewLine            new DateTime(1900,7,4), //4th of julyDi2015NewLine            new DateTime(1900,12, 25) //ChristmasDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Finds the most recent workday from a given date.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="date">The date to test.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The most recent workday.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static DateTime GetLastWorkday(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Test for a non working dayDi2015NewLine        if (IsDayOff(date))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //We hit a non working day, recursively call this function again on yesterday.Di2015NewLine            return GetLastWorkday(date.AddDays(-1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Not a holiday or a weekend, return the current date.Di2015NewLine        return date;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns if the date is work day or not.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="testDate">Date to test</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if the date is a holiday or weekend</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsDayOff(DateTime testDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday ||Di2015NewLine             date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday || //Test for weekendDi2015NewLine             IsMovingHolidy(testDate) || //Test for a moving holidayDi2015NewLine             fixedHolidays.Contains(testDate); //Test for a fixed holidayDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Tests for each of the "dynamic" holidays that do not fall on the same date every year.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static bool IsMovingHolidy(DateTime testDate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Memoral day is the last Monday in MayDi2015NewLine        if (testDate.Month == 5 && //The month is May Di2015NewLine                testDate.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Monday && //It is a MondayDi2015NewLine                testDate.Day > (31 - 7)) //It lands within the last week of the month.Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Labor day is the first Monday in SeptemberDi2015NewLine        if (testDate.Month == 9 && //The month is septemberDi2015NewLine                testDate.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Monday &&Di2015NewLine                testDate.Day <= 7) //It lands within the first week of the monthDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Thanksgiving is the 4th Thursday in NovemberDi2015NewLine        if (testDate.Month == 11 && //The month of NovemberDi2015NewLine            testDate.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Thursday &&Di2015NewLine            testDate.Day > (7*3) && testDate.Day <= (7*4)) //Only durning the 4th weekDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This comparer only tests the day and month of a date time for equalityDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private class DayOnlyComparer : IEqualityComparer<DateTime>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public bool Equals(DateTime x, DateTime y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return x.Day == y.Day && x.Month == y.Month;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int GetHashCode(DateTime obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return obj.Month + (obj.Day + 12);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19113815Di2015UniqueSeparatorinstance
19113815Di2015UniqueSeparator// Gather the abstract methodDi2015NewLinelet mAbstract = Application.Methods.WithFullName("MyNamespace.IMyInterface.Method1()").Single()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefrom m in Methods where m.IsUsing(mAbstract)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get ctors called by MethodCaller()Di2015NewLinelet ctorsCalled = m.MethodsCalled.Where(mc => mc.IsConstructor)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get classes that implement IMyInterface instantiated by MethodCaller()Di2015NewLinelet classesInstantiated = ctorsCalled.ParentTypes().Where(t => t.Implement("MyNamespace.IMyInterface"))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get override of Method1() 'probably' called.Di2015NewLinelet overridesCalled = classesInstantiated.ChildMethods().Where(m1 => m1.OverriddensBase.Contains(mAbstract))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineselect new { m, overridesCalled }Di2015NewLine

19114064Di2015UniqueSeparator//convert a date into a string in a culture specific formatDi2015NewLinefunction FormatDate(thisDate, culture) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var date = thisDate.getDate();Di2015NewLine    var month = thisDate.getMonth() + 1;Di2015NewLine    var year = thisDate.getFullYear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var strDate = date.toString();Di2015NewLine    if (strDate.length == 1)Di2015NewLine        strDate = ("0" + strDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var strMonth = month.toString();Di2015NewLine    if (strMonth.length == 1)Di2015NewLine        strMonth = ("0" + strMonth);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    culture = culture.toLowerCase();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (culture) {Di2015NewLine        case "en-gb":Di2015NewLine            return (strDate + "/" + strMonth + "/" + year.toString());Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case "en-us":Di2015NewLine            return (strMonth + "/" + strDate + "/" + year.toString());Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            return (strDate + "/" + strMonth + "/" + year.toString());Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        set { throw new NotImplementedException(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IBindingListView.RemoveFilter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ListSortDescriptionCollection IBindingListView.SortDescriptionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (this.sorts == null ? null : this.sorts.Sorts); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool IBindingListView.SupportsAdvancedSortingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return true; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool IBindingListView.SupportsFilteringDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void RemoveSortCore()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.sorts = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void ApplySortCore(PropertyDescriptor prop, ListSortDirection direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ListSortDescription[] arr = { new ListSortDescription(prop, direction) };Di2015NewLine        ApplySort(new ListSortDescriptionCollection(arr));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PropertyComparerCollection<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly PropertyComparer<T>[] comparers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly ListSortDescriptionCollection sorts;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertyComparerCollection(ListSortDescriptionCollectionDi2015NewLine                                          sorts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sorts == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("sorts");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.sorts = sorts;Di2015NewLine        List<PropertyComparer<T>> list = newDi2015NewLine            List<PropertyComparer<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (ListSortDescription item in sorts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new PropertyComparer<T>(item.PropertyDescriptor,Di2015NewLine                                             item.SortDirection == ListSortDirection.Descending));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.comparers = list.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ListSortDescriptionCollection SortsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.sorts; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertyDescriptor PrimaryPropertyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.comparers.Length == 0Di2015NewLine                       ? nullDi2015NewLine                       : this.comparers[0].Property;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ListSortDirection PrimaryDirectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.comparers.Length == 0Di2015NewLine                       ? ListSortDirection.AscendingDi2015NewLine                       : this.comparers[0].DescendingDi2015NewLine                             ? ListSortDirection.DescendingDi2015NewLine                             : ListSortDirection.Ascending;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int IComparer<T>.Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int result = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyComparer<T> t in this.comparers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = t.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine            if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PropertyComparer<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly bool descending;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly PropertyDescriptor property;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertyComparer(PropertyDescriptor property, bool descending)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("property");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.descending = descending;Di2015NewLine        this.property = property;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool DescendingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.descending; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertyDescriptor PropertyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.property; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int value = Comparer.Default.Compare(this.property.GetValue(x),Di2015NewLine                                             this.property.GetValue(y));Di2015NewLine        return this.descending ? -value : value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
