19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatortype CallPutFlag = Call | PutDi2015NewLine
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatortype Black76Results =  { Vega : float; Valuation : float }Di2015NewLine
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorblack76
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorblack76
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlack76Results
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorlet black76 flag fwd strike time rf vol = Di2015NewLine  let d1 = (Math.Log(fwd / strike) + (vol * vol * 0.5) * time) / (vol * Math.Sqrt(time))Di2015NewLine  let d2 = d1 - vol * Math.Sqrt(time)Di2015NewLine  let n = new MathNet.Numerics.Distributions.Normal()Di2015NewLine  match flag withDi2015NewLine  | Call ->Di2015NewLine      let valuation = Math.Exp(-rf * time) * (fwd * n.InverseCumulativeDistribution(d1) - strike * n.InverseCumulativeDistribution(d2))Di2015NewLine      let delta = Math.Exp(-rf * time) * n.InverseCumulativeDistribution(d1) Di2015NewLine      let gamma = Math.Exp(-rf * time) * (n.Density(d1) / (fwd * vol * Math.Sqrt(time)))Di2015NewLine      let vega = Math.Exp(-rf * time) * n.Density(d1) * fwd * Math.Sqrt(time)Di2015NewLine      let rho = time * strike * Math.Sqrt(-rf * time) * n.InverseCumulativeDistribution(d2)Di2015NewLine      let theta = -(fwd * vol * n.Density(d1)) / (2.0 * Math.Sqrt(time))  - rf * strike * Math.Sqrt(-rf * time) * n.InverseCumulativeDistribution(d2)Di2015NewLine      { Vega = vega; Valuation = valuation }       Di2015NewLine  | Put -> Di2015NewLine      failwith "TODO: Similar for Put"Di2015NewLine
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorCall
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorPut
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorimpliedVol
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorblack76
19119766Di2015UniqueSeparatorlet impliedVol flag fwd strike time rf blackPrice = Di2015NewLine  let vst = Math.Sqrt(2.0*Math.Abs((Math.Log(fwd/strike)+rf*time)/time))Di2015NewLine  let tol = 0.0001Di2015NewLine  let mutable v = vstDi2015NewLine  let mutable sigmadiff = 1.0Di2015NewLine  let mutable k = 1Di2015NewLine  let kmax = 100Di2015NewLine  while (sigmadiff >= tol && k < kmax) doDi2015NewLine      let b = black76 flag fwd strike time rf vDi2015NewLine      let option = b.ValuationDi2015NewLine      let cvega = b.VegaDi2015NewLine      let increment = (option - blackPrice) / cvegaDi2015NewLine      v <- v - incrementDi2015NewLine      k <- k + 1Di2015NewLine      sigmadiff <- Math.Abs(increment)Di2015NewLine  vDi2015NewLine

19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatora, b  =  b, a-q*b
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatortemp1 = bDi2015NewLinetemp2 = a-q*bDi2015NewLinea = temp1Di2015NewLineb = temp2Di2015NewLine
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatora = 5
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatorb = 7
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatorq = 10
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatora, b = (7), (5 - 10*7)Di2015NewLine
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatora == 7Di2015NewLineb == -65Di2015NewLine
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatora
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatorb
19119932Di2015UniqueSeparatora = b      // a is changed BEFORE evaluating the valueDi2015NewLine           //   that will be put into bDi2015NewLineb = a-q*b  // The value of a has already been changed:Di2015NewLine           //   this is now the same as b = b-q*b, which is not intendedDi2015NewLine

19125812Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets the rooted initial directory to use to access the host.Di2015NewLine/// Returns an empty string if the server is unavailable.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="serverName">The server to connect to.</param>Di2015NewLineprivate static string GetInitialDirectoryFromServerName(string serverName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Assume we can't connect to the server to start with.Di2015NewLine    var initialDirectory = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If this is a rooted path, just make sure it is available.Di2015NewLine    if (Path.IsPathRooted(serverName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the path doesn't exist, reset it.Di2015NewLine        if (Directory.Exists(serverName))Di2015NewLine            initialDirectory = serverName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Else this is a network path.Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the server name has a backslash in it, remove the backslash and everything after it (e.g. SQL001\\Test should just be SQL001).Di2015NewLine        serverName = serverName.Trim(@"\\".ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine        if (serverName.Contains(@"\\"))Di2015NewLine            serverName = serverName.Remove(serverName.IndexOf(@"\\", System.StringComparison.Ordinal));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If the server is available, format the Initial Directory properly to use it.Di2015NewLine            if (System.Net.Dns.GetHostEntry(serverName) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Root the path as a network path (i.e. add \\\\ to the front of it).Di2015NewLine                initialDirectory = string.Format("\\\\\\\\{0}", serverName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Eat any Host Not Found exceptions for if we can't connect to the server.Di2015NewLine        catch (System.Net.Sockets.SocketException e)Di2015NewLine        { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return initialDirectory;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19125853Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Drawing.Bitmap

19127471Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var xml = @"Di2015NewLine<rootNode>Di2015NewLine    <foo enabled=""true"">Di2015NewLine         <bar enabled=""false"" myAttribute=""5.6"" />Di2015NewLine         <baz>Text!</baz>Di2015NewLine    </foo>Di2015NewLine</rootNode>Di2015NewLine";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var document = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine    document.LoadXml(xml);Di2015NewLine    var retVal = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    Go(retVal, document.DocumentElement, new List<string>());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Go(Dictionary<string, string> theDict, XmlElement start, List<string> keyTokens)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Process simple contentDi2015NewLine    var textNode = start.ChildNodes.OfType<XmlText>().SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (textNode != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        theDict[string.Join(".", keyTokens.ToArray())] = textNode.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Process attributesDi2015NewLine    foreach (XmlAttribute att in start.Attributes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        theDict[string.Join(".", keyTokens.ToArray()) + "." + att.Name] = att.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Process child nodesDi2015NewLine    foreach (var childNode in start.ChildNodes.OfType<XmlElement>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Go(theDict, childNode, new List<string>(keyTokens) { childNode.Name });   // shorthand for .AddDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19127867Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyViewModel : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher dispatcher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyViewModel(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher dispatcher)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dispatcher = dispatcher;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int myPropertyUpdating; //needs to be marked volatile if you care about non x86Di2015NewLine    double myProperty;Di2015NewLine    double MyProperyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Hack for Missing Interlocked.Read for doublesDi2015NewLine            // if you are compiled for 64 bit you should be able to just do a readDi2015NewLine            var retv = Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref myProperty, myProperty, -myProperty);Di2015NewLine            return retv;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (myProperty != value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // if you are compiled for 64 bit you can just do an assignment hereDi2015NewLine                Interlocked.Exchange(ref myProperty, value);Di2015NewLine                if (Interlocked.Exchange(ref myPropertyUpdating, 1) == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dispatcher.BeginInvoke(() =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            PropertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs("MyProperty"));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        finallyDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            myPropertyUpdating = 0;Di2015NewLine                            Thread.MemoryBarrier(); // This will flush the store buffer which is the technically correct thing to do... but I've never had problems with out itDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }, null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged = delegate {};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}    Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string imageDesc { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19132351Di2015UniqueSeparatorcatch(Exception e)
19132351Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static ActionResult HandleException(Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Calling the EL exception handler block. Configured to rethrow a HandledException.Di2015NewLine                ExceptionPolicy.HandleException(e, ExceptionPolicyName.StatusCodePolicy.GetCode());Di2015NewLine                //If no exception happened, that is a problem. Internal Server Error, also logging should be done.Di2015NewLine                return new HttpStatusCodeResult(HttpStatusCode.InternalServerError);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //Catch the HandledException. It contains only controlled info on the error, which can be sent to the client. Also, the original exception is already logged by this time.Di2015NewLine            catch (HandledException ex)Di2015NewLine            {              Di2015NewLine                return new HttpStatusCodeResult(ex.StatusCode, ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //If the exception was not a HandledException (very unlikely), that is a problem, it should be logged. Also, Internal Server Error.Di2015NewLine                return new HttpStatusCodeResult(HttpStatusCode.InternalServerError);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

19132648Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    Int32 my_Id;Di2015NewLine    if (context.Request.QueryString["getID"] != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       my_Id = Convert.ToInt32(context.Request.QueryString["getID"]);Di2015NewLine       context.Response.ContentType = "image/jpeg";Di2015NewLine       Stream strm = ShowEmpImage(my_Id);Di2015NewLine       byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine       int byteSeq = strm.Read(buffer, 0, 4096);Di2015NewLine       while (byteSeq > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           context.Response.OutputStream.Write(buffer, 0, byteSeq);Di2015NewLine           byteSeq = strm.Read(buffer, 0, 4096);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Stream ShowEmpImage(int my_Id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   string conn = ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["constr"].ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine   SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(conn);Di2015NewLine   string sql = "select blueBallImage from CorrespondingBall WHERE characterID = @ID";Di2015NewLine   SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sql, connection);Di2015NewLine   cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLine   cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@ID", my_Id);Di2015NewLine   connection.Open();Di2015NewLine   object img = cmd.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine   return new MemoryStream((byte[])img);Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

19133059Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IDisplayColumnDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    bool Visible { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    int Order { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    Func<object, object> Value { get; }Di2015NewLine    T GetValue<T>(object source);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DisplayColumn<T>: IDisplayColumnDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool Visible { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Order { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Func<object, object> Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Title;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TValue GetValue<TValue>(object source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (TValue)Convert.ChangeType(Value(source), typeof(TValue));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Func<T, object> SelectorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Value = value.ConvertObject<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IColumnSetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type TypeHandled { get; }Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<IDisplayColumn> Columns { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ColumnSet<T>: IColumnSetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Type TypeHandledDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<IDisplayColumn> Columns { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Func<object, object> ConvertObject<T>(this Func<T, object> func)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Contract.Requires(func != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine    var convertedParam = new Expression[] { Expression.Convert(param, typeof(T)) };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression call;Di2015NewLine    call = Expression.Convert(Di2015NewLine        func.Target == nullDi2015NewLine            ? 19135106Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Print_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineWarning[] warnings;Di2015NewLinestring[] streamIds;Di2015NewLinestring mimeType = string.Empty;Di2015NewLinestring encoding = string.Empty;Di2015NewLinestring extension = string.Empty;Di2015NewLinestring devinfo = "<DeviceInfo><ColorDepth>32</ColorDepth><DpiX>350</DpiX><DpiY>350</DpiY><OutputFormat>PDF</OutputFormat>" +Di2015NewLine       "  <PageWidth>8.5in</PageWidth>" +Di2015NewLine        "  <PageHeight>11in</PageHeight>" +Di2015NewLine        "  <MarginTop>0.5in</MarginTop>" +Di2015NewLine        "  <MarginLeft>0.5in</MarginLeft>" +Di2015NewLine         "  <MarginRight>0in</MarginRight>" +Di2015NewLine         "  <MarginBottom>0in</MarginBottom>" +Di2015NewLine       "</DeviceInfo>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Setup the report viewer object and get the array of bytesDi2015NewLineReportViewer viewer = new ReportViewer();Di2015NewLineviewer.ProcessingMode = ProcessingMode.Local;Di2015NewLineviewer.LocalReport.ReportPath = Server.MapPath("~/Installments_Report.rdlc");Di2015NewLineDataView dv = new DataView();Di2015NewLineDataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLinedv = (System.Data.DataView)SqlDataSource1.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty);Di2015NewLinedt = dv.ToTable();Di2015NewLineviewer.LocalReport.DataSources.Add(new ReportDataSource("DataSet1", dt));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] bytes = viewer.LocalReport.Render("PDF", devinfo, out mimeType, out encoding, out extension, out streamIds, out warnings);Di2015NewLine// Now that you have all the bytes representing the PDF report, buffer it and send it to the client.Di2015NewLinestring path =Server.MapPath("Print_Files") ;Di2015NewLineRandom rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineint month = rnd.Next(1, 13); // creates a number between 1 and 12Di2015NewLineint dice = rnd.Next(1, 7); // creates a number between 1 and 6Di2015NewLineint card = rnd.Next(9); // creates a number between 0 and 51Di2015NewLinestring file_name = "Installments" + "List" + month+dice+card+".pdf"; //save the file in unique name Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//3. After that use file stream to write from bytes to pdf file on your server pathDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFileStream file = new FileStream(path + "/" + file_name, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.ReadWrite);Di2015NewLinefile.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLinefile.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//4.path the file name by using query string to new page Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineResponse.Write(string.Format("<script>window.open('{0}','_blank');</script>", "Print.aspx?file="+file_name));Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

19135426Di2015UniqueSeparatorIObservable<IEnumerable<ChangeDTO>> allItems = Di2015NewLineObservable.FromEventPattern<CollectionChangedEventArgs>(Di2015NewLine    x => source.CollectionChanged += x,Di2015NewLine    x => source.CollectionChanged-= x)Di2015NewLine    .Select(i => new ChangeDTO(source.SelectedItems, true, null)});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIObservable<IEnumerable<ChangeDTO>> updatedItem = Di2015NewLineObservable.FromEventPattern<PropertyChangedEventArgs>(Di2015NewLine    x => source.PropertyChanged += x,Di2015NewLine    x => source.PropertyChanged -= x).Di2015NewLine    .Select(i => new ChangeDTO(new[] {source.Item}, false, source.UpdatedProperties));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar collectUpdatedItems = allItemsDi2015NewLine    // We only need to know the CCE happened, not the details of it, so convert to UnitsDi2015NewLine    .Select(_ => Unit.Default)Di2015NewLine    // We must insert an event so PCEs are buffered before the first CCEDi2015NewLine    .StartWith(Unit.Default)Di2015NewLine    // Here we create a new PCE buffer stream at the start and after each CCEDi2015NewLine    .Select(_ => updateItem.Buffer(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(300)))Di2015NewLine    // On a CCE, switch to the new PCE buffer stream, dropping the current PCE bufferDi2015NewLine    .Switch()Di2015NewLine    // Finally drop any empty buffersDi2015NewLine    .Where(i => i.Count > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// merge the CollectionChangedEvents with the PropertyChangedEvent buffersDi2015NewLinereturn collectionUpdateItems.Merge(allItems.Select(i => new List<ChangeDTO> {i}));Di2015NewLine

19137941Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Finds the text files that contain paragraph.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="paragraph">The paragraph to check for.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="textFilePaths">A list of paths to text files to check.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    List<string> FindFilesWithParagraph(string paragraph, List<string> textFilePaths)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> foundPaths = new List<string>(); // list of paths to text files w/ paragraphDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string path in textFilePaths) // iterate through each fileDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!File.Exists(path)) // check files actually existDi2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var sr = new System.IO.StreamReader(path))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sr.ReadToEnd().Contains(paragraph)) // read contents of fileDi2015NewLine                    foundPaths.Add(path); // and add it to list if it contains the paragraphDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return foundPaths;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19138873Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection<item> _buffer = new BlockingCollection<item>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Produce()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while(true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Produce item;Di2015NewLine        _buffer.Add(curItem);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // eventually stop producingDi2015NewLine    _buffer.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Consume(int myIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var curItem in _buffer.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Consume item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int N = 100;Di2015NewLine    Thread[] consumers = new Thread[N];Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        consumers[i] = new Thread(Consume);Di2015NewLine        consumers[i].Start(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Thread producer = new Thread(Produce);Di2015NewLine    producer.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19138873Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Consume(item curItem)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // consume itemDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Thread producer = new Thread(Produce);Di2015NewLine    producer.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Parallel.ForEach(_buffer.GetConsumingPartitioner(), Consumer)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19142175Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Task<T>> Order<T>(this IEnumerable<Task<T>> tasks)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var taskList = tasks.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var taskSources = new BlockingCollection<TaskCompletionSource<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var taskSourceList = new List<TaskCompletionSource<T>>(taskList.Count);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var task in taskList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newSource = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLine        taskSources.Add(newSource);Di2015NewLine        taskSourceList.Add(newSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        task.ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var source = taskSources.Take();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (t.IsCanceled)Di2015NewLine                source.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine            else if (t.IsFaulted)Di2015NewLine                source.TrySetException(t.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine            else if (t.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine                source.TrySetResult(t.Result);Di2015NewLine        }, CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.PreferFairness, TaskScheduler.Default);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return taskSourceList.Select(tcs => tcs.Task);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19148804Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Function IsTypeSafe(value As Variant) As BooleanDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim result As BooleanDi2015NewLine    result = this.ItemTypeName = vbNullString Or this.ItemTypeName = TypeName(value)Di2015NewLine    If result Then GoTo QuickExitDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result = result _Di2015NewLine        Or this.ItemTypeName = "Integer" And StringMatchesAny(TypeName(value), "Byte") _Di2015NewLine        Or this.ItemTypeName = "Long" And StringMatchesAny(TypeName(value), "Integer", "Byte") _Di2015NewLine        Or this.ItemTypeName = "Single" And StringMatchesAny(TypeName(value), "Long", "Integer", "Byte") _Di2015NewLine        Or this.ItemTypeName = "Double" And StringMatchesAny(TypeName(value), "Long", "Integer", "Byte", "Single") _Di2015NewLine        Or this.ItemTypeName = "Currency" And StringMatchesAny(TypeName(value), "Long", "Integer", "Byte", "Single", "Double")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineQuickExit:Di2015NewLine    IsTypeSafe = resultDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

19148804Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Function IndexOf(value As Variant) As LongDi2015NewLine    Dim i As Long, isRef As Boolean, comparable As IComparableDi2015NewLine    isRef = IsReferenceTypeDi2015NewLine    For i = 1 To this.Encapsulated.CountDi2015NewLine        If isRef ThenDi2015NewLine            If TypeOf this.Encapsulated(i) Is IComparable And TypeOf value Is IComparable ThenDi2015NewLine                Set comparable = this.Encapsulated(i)Di2015NewLine                If comparable.Equals(value) ThenDi2015NewLine                    IndexOf = iDi2015NewLine                    Exit FunctionDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            ElseDi2015NewLine                'reference type isn't comparable: use reference equalityDi2015NewLine                If ObjPtr(this.Encapsulated(i)) = ObjPtr(value) ThenDi2015NewLine                    IndexOf = iDi2015NewLine                    Exit FunctionDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            If this.Encapsulated(i) = value ThenDi2015NewLine                IndexOf = iDi2015NewLine                Exit FunctionDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLine    IndexOf = -1Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Function Contains(value As Variant) As BooleanDi2015NewLine    Dim v As Variant, isRef As Boolean, comparable As IComparableDi2015NewLine    isRef = IsReferenceTypeDi2015NewLine    For Each v In this.EncapsulatedDi2015NewLine        If isRef ThenDi2015NewLine            If TypeOf v Is IComparable And TypeOf value Is IComparable ThenDi2015NewLine                Set comparable = vDi2015NewLine                If comparable.Equals(value) Then Contains = True: Exit FunctionDi2015NewLine            ElseDi2015NewLine                'reference type isn't comparable: use reference equalityDi2015NewLine FunctionDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

19148804Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Function Min() As VariantDi2015NewLine    Dim i As Long, isRef As BooleanDi2015NewLine    Dim smallest As Variant, isSmaller As Boolean, comparable As IComparableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    isRef = IsReferenceTypeDi2015NewLine    For i = 1 To CountDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If isRef And IsEmpty(smallest) ThenDi2015NewLine            Set 19152404Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Util Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, Type> guidMap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Util()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        guidMap = new Dictionary<string, Type>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyLoad += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            try Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _ScanAssembly(e.LoadedAssembly);Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            catch Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Assembly a in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            try Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _ScanAssembly(a);Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            catch Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void _ScanAssembly(Assembly a)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Type t in a.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attrs = t.GetCustomAttributes<GuidAttribute>(false);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in attrs) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!guidMap.ContainsKey(item.Value.ToLower()))Di2015NewLine                    guidMap.Add(item.Value.ToLower(), t);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Dictionary<string, Type> GuidMap Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return guidMap;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19158225Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Char Remover(Char[] value, int indexToRemove = 5) {Di2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, value))Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLine  else if (value.Length <= 0)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("Empty arrays are not allowed.", "value");Di2015NewLine  else if (indexToRemove <= 0)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("indexToRemove", "indexToRemove should be positive.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  List<Char> list = value.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (list.Count > 1) {Di2015NewLine    int index = (indexToRemove - 1) % list.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return list[0];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void TestRemover() {Di2015NewLine  Char[] array = new Char[] { 'S', 'T', 'R', 'I', 'N', 'G' };Di2015NewLine  Debug.Assert(Remover(array, 5) == 'I');Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class JsonCreationConverter<T> : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Create an instance of objectType, based properties in the JSON objectDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="objectType">type of object expected</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="jObject">contents of JSON object that will be deserialized</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    protected abstract T Create(Type objectType, JObject jObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(T).IsAssignableFrom(objectType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Load Create(objectType, jObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Populate the object propertiesDi2015NewLine        serializer.Populate(jObject.CreateReader(), target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19159116Di2015UniqueSeparatorBLOB
19159161Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<List<int>> GetLists(int[] nums, bool strict) { Di2015NewLine        List<List<int>> lists = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLine        List<int> list = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        lists.Add(list);Di2015NewLine        list.AddRange(nums.Take(1));Di2015NewLine        if (nums.Length <= 1) {Di2015NewLine            return lists;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (strict && nums[0] == nums[1]) {Di2015NewLine            list = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            lists.Add(list);Di2015NewLine            list.Add(nums[1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            list.Add(nums[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nums.Length == 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return lists;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int direction = Math.Sign(nums[2] - nums[1]);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 2; i < nums.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            int d = Math.Sign(nums[i] - nums[i - 1]);Di2015NewLine            if ((d == direction && (d != 0 || !strict))Di2015NewLine                    || (d != 0 && strict)Di2015NewLine                    || (Math.Abs(d + direction) == 1 && !strict))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(nums[i]);Di2015NewLine                if (d != 0 && direction == 0) direction = d;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                direction = d;Di2015NewLine                list = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine                list.Add(nums[i]);Di2015NewLine                lists.Add(list);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return lists;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] nums = new int[] { 2, 2, 2, 1, 1, 3, 3, 4, 4 };Di2015NewLine        var lists = GetLists(nums, false);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var list in lists) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in list)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(item + " ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine         * Prints:Di2015NewLine         * 2 2 2 1 1Di2015NewLine         * 3 3 4 4Di2015NewLine         * */Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

    private void userControl11_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                                using (Graphics g = e.Graphics)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    GraphicsContainer container = g.BeginContainer(Di2015NewLine                          new RectangleF(0f, 0f, 300f, 300f)Di2015NewLine                        , new 350f));Di2015NewLine                    g.DrawLine(new Pen(Color.Gray), 150f, 0f, 150f, 300f);Di2015NewLine                    g.DrawLine(new Pen(Color.Gray), 0f, 150f, 300f, 150f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    float xOrigVect = (float)_originalVector.X;Di2015NewLine                    float yOrigVect = (float)_originalVector.Y;Di2015NewLine 19162752Di2015UniqueSeparatorfrom w in partsDi2015NewLinewhere Filter(w)Di2015NewLinegroup w by new { w.PartNumber, w.StockLength } into gDi2015NewLinelet someValue = int.Parse((Math.Ceiling(g.Sum(s => s.Length)/(g.Key.StockLength))).ToString())Di2015NewLineselect newDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Total = g.Key.StockLength > 0 ? someValue : 1,Di2015NewLine    TotalLength = g.Sum(s => s.Length),Di2015NewLine    Loss = g.Key.StockLength > 0 ? someValue - (g.Sum(s => s.Length)) : 0,Di2015NewLine    Cost = (g.Key.StockLength > 0 ? someValue : 1)*g.Average(s => s.Cost),Di2015NewLine    CutPart = g.FirstOrDefault(),Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine

19165454Di2015UniqueSeparator[JsonConverter]
19165454Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass IdOnlyConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return objectType.IsClass;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartObject();Di2015NewLine        writer.WritePropertyName("Id");Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteValue(GetId(value));Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndObject();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int GetId(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo prop = obj.GetType().GetProperty("Id", typeof(int));Di2015NewLine        if (prop != null && prop.CanRead)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (int)prop.GetValue(obj, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19166225Di2015UniqueSeparatorprintDocument1_PrintPage
19166225Di2015UniqueSeparator        private void printDocument1_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // calculate width and height scalings taking page margins into accountDi2015NewLine            var wScale = e.MarginBounds.Width / (float)_memoryImage.Width;Di2015NewLine            var hScale = e.MarginBounds.Height / (float)_memoryImage.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // choose the smaller of the two scalesDi2015NewLine            var scale = wScale < hScale ? wScale : hScale;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // apply scaling to the imageDi2015NewLine            e.Graphics.ScaleTransform(scale, scale);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // print to default printer's pageDi2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawImage(_memoryImage, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

19167435Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer
19167435Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SchoolComparer : IEqualityComparer<School>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(School x, School y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Check whether the compared objects reference the same data. Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(x, y)) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Check whether any of the compared objects is null. Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(x, null) || Object.ReferenceEquals(y, null))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Check whether the school' properties are equal. Di2015NewLine        return x.Name == y.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If Equals() returns true for a pair of objects  Di2015NewLine    // then GetHashCode() must return the same value for these objects. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(School school)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Check whether the object is null Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(school, null)) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get hash code for the Name field if it is not null. Di2015NewLine        int hashSchoolName = school.Name == null ? 0 : school.Name.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Calculate the hash code for the school. Di2015NewLine        return hashSchoolName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly Regex rxNonDigits = new Regex( @"[^\\d]+");Di2015NewLine
19169192Di2015UniqueSeparator// simply replace the offending substrings with an empty stringDi2015NewLineprivate string CleanStringOfNonDigits_V1( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if ( string.IsNullOrEmpty(s) ) return s ;Di2015NewLine  string cleaned = rxNonDigits.Replace(s, "") ;Di2015NewLine  return cleaned ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// split the string into an array of good substringsDi2015NewLine// using the bad substrings as the delimiter.Di2015NewLine// Then aggregate that into a StringBuilder to get the result.Di2015NewLineprivate string CleanStringOfNonDigits_V2( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(s)) return s;Di2015NewLine  string cleaned = rxNonDigitsDi2015NewLine                   .Split(s)Di2015NewLine                   .Aggregate(new StringBuilder(), (sb,ss) => sb.Append(ss) )Di2015NewLine                   .ToString()Di2015NewLine                   ;Di2015NewLine  return cleaned ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Regex rxDigits = new Regex( @"[\\d]+") ;Di2015NewLine
19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string CleanStringOfNonDigits_V3( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if ( string.IsNullOrEmpty(s) ) return s ;Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder() ;Di2015NewLine  for ( Match m = rxDigits.Match(s) ; m.Success ; m = m.NextMatch() )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(m.Value) ;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  string cleaned = sb.ToString() ;Di2015NewLine  return cleaned ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<char>
19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string CleanStringOfNonDigits_V4( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if ( string.IsNullOrEmpty(s) ) return s;Di2015NewLine  string cleaned = new string( s.Where( char.IsDigit ).ToArray() ) ;Di2015NewLine  return cleaned;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string CleanStringOfNonDigits_V5( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(s)) return s;Di2015NewLine  string cleaned = new string(s.Where( c => c-'0' < 10 ).ToArray() ) ;Di2015NewLine  return cleaned;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string CleanStringOfNonDigits_V6( string s )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(s)) return s;Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(s.Length) ;Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < s.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    char c = s[i];Di2015NewLine    if ( c < '0' ) continue ;Di2015NewLine    if ( c > '9' ) continue ;Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(s[i]);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  string cleaned = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine  return cleaned;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19169192Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string CleanStringOfNonDigits_V7(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(s)) return s;Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(s);Di2015NewLine  int j = 0 ;Di2015NewLine  int i = 0 ;Di2015NewLine  while ( i < sb.Length )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    bool isDigit = char.IsDigit( sb[i] ) ;Di2015NewLine    if ( isDigit )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      sb[j++] = sb[i++];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      ++i ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  sb.Length = j;Di2015NewLine  string cleaned = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine  return cleaned;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("Waiting for a connection... ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Perform a blocking call to accept requests. Di2015NewLine                // You could also user server.AcceptSocket() here.Di2015NewLine                TcpClient client = server.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Hello!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                data = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get a stream object for reading and writingDi2015NewLine                NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Loop to receive all the data sent by the client. Di2015NewLine                while ((i = stream.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Translate data bytes to a ASCII string.Di2015NewLine                    data = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetString(bytes, 0, i);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Received: {0}", data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Process the data sent by the client.Di2015NewLine                    data = data.ToUpper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    byte[] msg = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Send back a response.Di2015NewLine                    stream.Write(msg, 0, msg.Length);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Sent: {0}", data);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Shutdown and end connectionDi2015NewLine                client.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (SocketException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("SocketException: {0}", e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Stop listening for new clients.Di2015NewLine            server.Stop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\nHit enter to continue...");Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing 19178791Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<int> numbers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Random ran = new Random();Di2015NewLine        int number = 0;Di2015NewLine        int min = 1;Di2015NewLine        int max = 51;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 50; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                number = ran.Next(min, max);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (numbers.Contains(number));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            numbers.Add(number);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (number == min) min++;Di2015NewLine            if (number == max - 1) max--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 50; i++)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(numbers[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19182484Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Dealer {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Fisher-Yates shuffle algorithm with explicit generatorDi2015NewLine  private static void CoreShuffle(IList<Kort> list, Random generator) {Di2015NewLine    if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, list))Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentNullException("list");Di2015NewLine    else if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, generator))Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentNullException("generator");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = list.Count - 1; i >= 0; --i) {Di2015NewLine      int index = generator.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Kurt h = list[index];Di2015NewLine      list[index] = list[i];Di2015NewLine      list[i] = h;Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Random rand = new Random(); // <- Be careful: Random is not thread safe; readonly is also a good addition hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Return new shuffled list based on deckOfCards      Di2015NewLine  public List<Kort> ShuffledList() {Di2015NewLine    List<Kort> result = new List<Kort>(deckOfCards); // <- Check this line in your codeDi2015NewLine    CoreShuffle(result, rand);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;   Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

19183463Di2015UniqueSeparator;
19183463Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Build your final resulting listDi2015NewLine    List<String> dane = new List<String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // use StreamReader to read the fileDi2015NewLine    using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(ms))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create a string builder that we can use to store eachDi2015NewLine        // line's contents until it's ready to be added to daneDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        // buffer charDi2015NewLine        Char c;Di2015NewLine        // read the stream character by characterDi2015NewLine        while (!sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            c = (Char)sr.Read();Di2015NewLine            // if it's `;` it's the end of a row, so add it toDi2015NewLine            // dane and reset the line's contentsDi2015NewLine            if (c == ';')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dane.Add(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLine                builder.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // avoid reading in superfluous whitespace before weDi2015NewLine            // begin reading a lineDi2015NewLine            else if (builder.Length == 0 && Char.IsWhiteSpace(c))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // concatenate the current character to our lineDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // if there's a final row, add it to daneDi2015NewLine        if (builder.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dane.Add(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // dane now contains each line's contents.Di2015NewLine

19186165Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void GetFromDictionary<T>(IDictionary<String, Object> dictionary, String key, ref T outputLocation)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!dictionary.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var valueAsObject = dictionary[key];Di2015NewLine    if (!CanBeCastTo<T>(valueAsObject))Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    outputLocation = (T)Convert.ChangeType(valueAsObject, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool CanBeCastTo<T>(Object thingToCast)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (thingToCast is T)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    if (tType == typeof(Int64) && thingToCast is Int32)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (tType == typeof(Double) && thingToCast is Decimal)Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19186500Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string json = @"Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ""prop1"": 142,Di2015NewLine            ""prop2"": ""Some description"",Di2015NewLine            ""object_prop"": {Di2015NewLine                ""abc"": 2,Di2015NewLine                ""def"": {Di2015NewLine                    ""foo"": ""hello"",Di2015NewLine                    ""bar"": 4Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            ""prop3"": 3.14Di2015NewLine        }";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, string> dict = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine        JObject jo = JObject.Parse(json);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (JProperty prop in jo.Properties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (prop.Value.Type == JTokenType.Array || Di2015NewLine                prop.Value.Type == JTokenType.Object)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // JSON string for complex objectDi2015NewLine                dict.Add(prop.Name, prop.Value.ToString(Formatting.None));  Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // primitive value converted to stringDi2015NewLine                object value = ((JValue)prop.Value).Value;  Di2015NewLine                dict.Add(prop.Name, value != null ? value.ToString() : null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> kvp in dict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(kvp.Key + " = " + kvp.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19187471Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.IO;Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine    public static void SetJpegResolution(string path, int dpi) {Di2015NewLine        using (var jpg = new FileStream(path, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.None)) Di2015NewLine        using (var br = new BinaryReader(jpg)) {Di2015NewLine            bool ok = br.ReadUInt16() == 0xd8ff;        // Check headerDi2015NewLine            ok = ok && br.ReadUInt16() == 0xe0ff;Di2015NewLine            br.ReadInt16();                             // Skip lengthDi2015NewLine            ok = ok && br.ReadUInt32() == 0x4649464a;   // Should be JFIFDi2015NewLine            ok = ok && br.ReadByte() == 0;Di2015NewLine            ok = ok && br.ReadByte() == 0x01;           // Major version should be 1Di2015NewLine            br.ReadByte();                              // Skip minor versionDi2015NewLine            byte density = br.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            ok = ok && (density == 1 || density == 2);Di2015NewLine            if (!ok) throw new Exception("Not a valid JPEG file");Di2015NewLine            if (density == 2) dpi = (int)Math.Round(dpi / 2.56);Di2015NewLine            var bigendian = BitConverter.GetBytes((short)dpi);Di2015NewLine            Array.Reverse(bigendian);Di2015NewLine            jpg.Write(bigendian, 0, 2);Di2015NewLine            jpg.Write(bigendian, 0, 2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19189660Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void RGBtoBGR(Bitmap bmp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BitmapData data = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height),Di2015NewLine                                   ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int length = Math.Abs(data.Stride) * bmp.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    unsafeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte* rgbValues = (byte*)data.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i += 3)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte dummy = rgbValues[i];Di2015NewLine            rgbValues[i] = rgbValues[i + 2];Di2015NewLine            rgbValues[i + 2] = dummy;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bmp.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19191465Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IDictionary<int, string> GetCompanies(int coid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = MemoryCache.Default[coid.ToString()] as IDictionary<int, string>;Di2015NewLine    if (result != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // we already have cached results => no need to perform expensive database callsDi2015NewLine        // we can return directly the cached results;Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // there's nothing in the cache => we need to make the DB callDi2015NewLine    // and cache the results for subsequent useDi2015NewLine    using (var dc = new CompanyViewModelDbContext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result =Di2015NewLine            (from cr in db.CompanyRelationshipDi2015NewLine             //This is grabbing all related companies to the logged in userDi2015NewLine             join c in db.Companies on cr.CoId equals c.CoIdDi2015NewLine             where cr.PartnerCoId == coidDi2015NewLine             select newDi2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 cr.CoId,Di2015NewLine                 c.CompanyNameDi2015NewLine             }).Distinct().ToDictionary(cr => cr.CoId, c => c.CompanyName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var policy = new CacheItemPolicyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Cache the results of the Db query for 24 hoursDi2015NewLine        AbsoluteExpiration = DateTimeOffset.Now.AddHours(24),Di2015NewLine        Priority = CacheItemPriority.NotRemovable,Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemoryCache.Default.Set(coid.ToString(), result, policy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19193051Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsafe static long DumbDifference(string file1Path, string file2Path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // completely untested! also, add some using()s here.Di2015NewLine    // also, map views in chunks if you plan to use it on large files.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemoryMappedFile file1 = MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(Di2015NewLine             file1Path, System.IO.FileMode.Open,Di2015NewLine             null, 0, MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine    MemoryMappedFile file2 = MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(Di2015NewLine             file2Path, System.IO.FileMode.Open,Di2015NewLine             null, 0, MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine    MemoryMappedViewAccessor view1 = file1.CreateViewAccessor();Di2015NewLine    MemoryMappedViewAccessor view2 = file2.CreateViewAccessor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long length1 = checked((long)view1.SafeMemoryMappedViewHandle.ByteLength);Di2015NewLine    long length2 = checked((long)view2.SafeMemoryMappedViewHandle.ByteLength);Di2015NewLine    long minLength = Math.Min(length1, length2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte* ptr1 = null, ptr2 = null;Di2015NewLine    view1.SafeMemoryMappedViewHandle.AcquirePointer(ref ptr1);Di2015NewLine    view2.SafeMemoryMappedViewHandle.AcquirePointer(ref ptr2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ulong differences = (ulong)Math.Abs(length1 - length2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (long i = 0; i < minLength; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if you expect your files to be pretty similar,Di2015NewLine        // you could optimize this by comparing long-sized chunks.Di2015NewLine        differences += ptr1[i] != ptr2[i] ? 1u : 0u;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return checked((long)differences);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19194562Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T>

19194562Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly Dictionary<Type, Node<Type>> _visitedTypes = new Dictionary<Type, Node<Type>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Node<Type> CreateTypeNode(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Node<Type> node;Di2015NewLine    if (_visitedTypes.TryGetValue(type, out node))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add the key to the cache to prevent infinite recursion; the value will be set laterDi2015NewLine    // if this type will be found again in a recursive call CreateTypeNode returns nullDi2015NewLine    // (null will be filtered out then)Di2015NewLine    _visitedTypes.Add(type, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var properties = type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var types = new HashSet<Type>(properties.Select(prop => GetElementType(prop.PropertyType)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var children = types.Select(CreateTypeNode).Where(n => n != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    node = new Node<Type>(type, children);Di2015NewLine    _visitedTypes[type] = node;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return node;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19195972Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar collisionNormal = Position - otherBall.Position;Di2015NewLinecollisionNormal.Normalize();Di2015NewLine//The direction of the collision plane, perpendicular to the normalDi2015NewLinevar collisionDirection = new Vector3(-collisionNormal.Y, collisionNormal.X, 0);Di2015NewLine
19195972Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar v1Parallel = Vector3.Dot(collisionNormal, V1) * collisionNormal;Di2015NewLinevar v1Ortho    = Vector3.Dot(collisionDirection, V1) * collisionDirection;Di2015NewLinevar v2Parallel = Vector3.Dot(collisionNormal, V2) * collisionNormal;Di2015NewLinevar v2Ortho    = Vector3.Dot(collisionDirection, V2) * collisionDirection;Di2015NewLine
19195972Di2015UniqueSeparatorv1 = v1Parallel + v1Ortho;Di2015NewLinev2 = v2Parallel + v2Ortho;Di2015NewLine
19195972Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar v1Length = v1Parallel.Length;Di2015NewLinevar v2Length = v2Parallel.Length;Di2015NewLinevar commonVelocity = 2 * (this.Mass * v1Length + otherBall.Mass * v2Length) / (this.Mass + otherBall.Mass);Di2015NewLinevar v1LengthAfterCollision = commonVelocity - v1Length;Di2015NewLinevar v2LengthAfterCollision = commonVelocity - v2Length;Di2015NewLinev1Parallel = v1Parallel * (v1LengthAfterCollision / v1Length);Di2015NewLinev2Parallel = v2Parallel * (v2LengthAfterCollision / v2Length);Di2015NewLine
19195972Di2015UniqueSeparatorthis.Velocity = v1Parallel + v1Ortho;Di2015NewLineotherBall.Velocity = v2Parallel + v2Ortho;Di2015NewLine

19200985Di2015UniqueSeparator        public static System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography GetClosestPointOnRoute(System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography line, System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography point)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlGeography sqlLine = SqlGeography.Parse(line.AsText()).MakeValid(); //the linestringDi2015NewLine        SqlGeography sqlPoint = SqlGeography.Parse(point.AsText()).MakeValid(); //the point i want on the lineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SqlGeography shortestLine = sqlPoint.ShortestLineTo(sqlLine); //find the shortest line from the linestring to pointDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //lines have a start, and an endDi2015NewLine        SqlGeography start = shortestLine.STStartPoint();Di2015NewLine        SqlGeography end = shortestLine.STEndPoint();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DbGeography newGeography = DbGeography.FromText(end.ToString(), 4326);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var distance = newGeography.Distance(line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return newGeography;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19201419Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async void MainWindow_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<string> enumerable = your urls here;Di2015NewLine    var results = new List<Tuple<string, string, Exception>>();Di2015NewLine    await enumerable.ForEachAsync(s => DownloadFileTaskAsync(s, null, 1000), (url, t) => results.Add(t));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine///     Downloads a file from a specified Internet address.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="remotePath">Internet address of the file to download.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="localPath">Di2015NewLine///     Local file name where to store the content of the download, if null a temporary file name willDi2015NewLine///     be generated.Di2015NewLine/// </param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="timeOut">Duration in miliseconds before cancelling the  operation.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A tuple containing the remote path, the local path and an exception if one occurred.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static async Task<Tuple<string, string, Exception>> DownloadFileTaskAsync(string remotePath,Di2015NewLine    string localPath = null, int timeOut = 3000)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (remotePath == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("DownloadFileTaskAsync (null remote path): skipping");Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("remotePath");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (localPath == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                string.Format(Di2015NewLine                    "DownloadFileTaskAsync (null local path): generating a temporary file name for {0}",Di2015NewLine                    remotePath));Di2015NewLine            localPath = Path.GetTempFileName();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var client = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TimerCallback timerCallback = c =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var webClient = (WebClient) c;Di2015NewLine                if (!webClient.IsBusy) return;Di2015NewLine                webClient.CancelAsync();Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine(string.Format("DownloadFileTaskAsync (time out due): {0}", remotePath));Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            using (var timer = new Timer(timerCallback, client, timeOut, Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                await client.DownloadFileTaskAsync(remotePath, localPath);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(string.Format("DownloadFileTaskAsync (downloaded): {0}", remotePath));Di2015NewLine            return new Tuple<string, string, Exception>(remotePath, localPath, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Tuple<string, string, Exception>(remotePath, null, ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Task ForEachAsync<TSource, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, Task<TResult>> taskSelector, Action<TSource, TResult> resultProcessor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var oneAtATime = new SemaphoreSlim(5, 10);Di2015NewLine        return Task.WhenAll(Di2015NewLine            from item in sourceDi2015NewLine            select ProcessAsync(item, taskSelector, resultProcessor, oneAtATime));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task ProcessAsync<TSource, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        TSource item,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, Task<TResult>> taskSelector, Action<TSource, TResult> resultProcessor,Di2015NewLine        SemaphoreSlim oneAtATime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TResult result = await taskSelector(item);Di2015NewLine        await oneAtATime.WaitAsync();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            resultProcessor(item, result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oneAtATime.Release();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19204610Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] filenames = {Di2015NewLine"1000 Ways to Die S01E01 Life Will Kill You",Di2015NewLine"somefile1x01description.ext",Di2015NewLine"sometext01x01description.ext",Di2015NewLine"sometext101description.ext",Di2015NewLine"sometextS01Edescription.ext",Di2015NewLine"sometextS01 Edescription.ext",Di2015NewLine"sometextS1Edescription.ext",Di2015NewLine"sometextS1 Edescription.ext",Di2015NewLine"sometextS1xdescription.ext",Di2015NewLine"24 S01xE01 12 AM"Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring [] res = {Di2015NewLine    @"[sS]?(?<season>\\d{1,2})[ xXeE]+(?<episode>\\d{1,2})", // Handles the cases where you have a delimiter and a digit on both sides, optional SDi2015NewLine    @"[sS](?<season>\\d{1,2})[ xXeE]+(?<episode>\\d{0,2})", // Handles the cases where you have a delimiter, a required S, but optional episode numberDi2015NewLine    @"(?<season>\\d{1,2})(?<episode>\\d{2})"  // Handles the case where you just have a 3 or 4 digit numberDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMatchEvaluator reFunc = match => // Given a Regex Match objectDi2015NewLine// An expression that returns the replacement stringDi2015NewLine"S" + // Start with the SDi2015NewLinematch.Groups["season"].Value // get the season groupDi2015NewLine.PadLeft(2,'0') + // zero pad itDi2015NewLine"xE" + // Add the EDi2015NewLine(match.Groups["episode"].Value.Length > 0 ? // Is there an episode number?Di2015NewLinematch.Groups["episode"].Value.PadLeft(2,'0') : // If so, zero pad itDi2015NewLine"01" // Otherwise assume episode 01Di2015NewLine); // End replacement expressionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(string name in filenames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Orig: {0}",name);Di2015NewLine    string replaced = name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string re in res)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Trying:" + re);Di2015NewLine        if(Regex.IsMatch(name,re))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Matched");Di2015NewLine            replaced = Regex.Replace(name,re,reFunc);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Replaced: {0}\\n\\n",replaced);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19204825Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class ParseStatusDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal bool IsSuccess;Di2015NewLine    internal IReadOnlyList<string> Messages;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate ParseStatus Load()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string filePath = "foo";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var data = File.ReadLines( filePath ).Select( line => line.Split( '\\t' ) ).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var results = from x in dataDi2015NewLine                    select new { Name = x[3], Age = x[1], Date = x[2], Time = x[5], Score = x[7] };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var errors = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    int row = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // first pass: look for errors by testing each valueDi2015NewLine    foreach( var line in results )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        row++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int dummy;Di2015NewLine        if( !int.TryParse( line.Age, out dummy ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            errors.Add( "Age couldn't be parsed as an int on line " + row );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // etc...use exception-free checks on each propertyDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if( errors.Count > 0 )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // quit, and return errors listDi2015NewLine        return new ParseStatus { IsSuccess = false, Messages = errors };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // otherwise, it is safe to load all rowsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TODO: second pass: load the dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new ParseStatus { IsSuccess = true };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
